com.google.android.exoplayer2.extractor.mp4

Class Sniffer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.exoplayer2.extractor.mp4.Sniffer

  • final class Sniffer
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides methods that peek data from an ExtractorInput and return whether the input appears to be in MP4 format.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int[] COMPATIBLE_BRANDS 
      private static int SEARCH_LENGTH
      The maximum number of bytes to peek when sniffing.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      private Sniffer() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      private static boolean isCompatibleBrand(int brand)
      Returns whether brand is an ftyp atom brand that is compatible with the MP4 extractors.
      static boolean sniffFragmented(ExtractorInput input)
      Returns whether data peeked from the current position in input is consistent with the input being a fragmented MP4 file.
      private static boolean sniffInternal(ExtractorInput input, boolean fragmented) 
      static boolean sniffUnfragmented(ExtractorInput input)
      Returns whether data peeked from the current position in input is consistent with the input being an unfragmented MP4 file.

    • Method Detail

      • sniffFragmented

        public static boolean sniffFragmented(ExtractorInput input)
                               throws java.io.IOException,
                                      java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns whether data peeked from the current position in input is consistent with the input being a fragmented MP4 file.
        Parameters:
        input - The extractor input from which to peek data. The peek position will be modified.
        Returns:
        Whether the input appears to be in the fragmented MP4 format.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs reading from the input.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the thread has been interrupted.

      • sniffUnfragmented

        public static boolean sniffUnfragmented(ExtractorInput input)
                                 throws java.io.IOException,
                                        java.lang.InterruptedException
        Returns whether data peeked from the current position in input is consistent with the input being an unfragmented MP4 file.
        Parameters:
        input - The extractor input from which to peek data. The peek position will be modified.
        Returns:
        Whether the input appears to be in the unfragmented MP4 format.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If an error occurs reading from the input.
        java.lang.InterruptedException - If the thread has been interrupted.
